main event: On July 4, 1966, a civilian reported observing a silvery round object in New Haven, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was observed for a total of 13 minutes,The witness noted the object traveled silently at a speed of about 5 miles per hour,It changed direction from south to north,The object was approximately 40 to 50 feet above the ground,The witness compared the size of the object to an aluminum sphere about 5 or 6 feet in diameter.
witness description: A boy aged 15 and his grandmother and sister.
